== Description ==
Removes comment ID from the comment cache. 

== Usage ==
%%%<?php clean_comment_cache( $ids ) ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$ids|integer&#124;array|Comment ID or array of comment IDs to remove from cache}}

== Return Values ==
; (void) : This function does not return a value.
